meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA, Planning and Urban Design
Patrick Blaydes, Planning and Urban Design
Victor Castro, BTR Construction Group LLC

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Minor Amendment Case
agenda_items.description: An application for a minor amendment to existing site plan for Specific Use Permit No. 2441 for a restaurant without drive-in or drive-through service.
agenda_items.presenter: Victor Castro, BTR Construction Group LLC

agenda_items.title: Waivers
agenda_items.description: An application for a waiver of the two-year waiting period to submit a zoning application.

agenda_items.title: Minor Amendment Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a minor amendment to an existing development plan.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Various applications for zoning cases under advisement.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Individual
agenda_items.description: Individual zoning cases requiring separate consideration.

agenda_items.title: Authorized Hearing - Zoning Cases
agenda_items.description: A City Plan Commission authorized hearing seeking a recommendation regarding a proposal to change the zoning classification.

agenda_items.title: Authorized Hearing - Under Advisement Zoning Cases
agenda_items.description: A City Plan Commission authorized hearing to determine the appropriate zoning for the area.

agenda_items.title: Special Provision Sign District
agenda_items.description: An application to create a new Special Provision Sign District.
